name: Macawkus Rawkus
description:
Fly around a house as a parrot and break stuff, gaining points for knocking stuff on the floor, or just play the piano. It's up to you.

Controls: Xbox controller recommended

Game Modes:

Timed Mode: Break stuff for points within a time limit

Free Mode: Break stuff at your own pace

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/Amos_Wolfe

This game was made for the "bird" themed Potluck party.

Find out more about Potluck here: https://www.facebook.com/PotLvckCo/ https://twitter.com/PotLvckCo
